query:
-- Add moderation fields to professional_profiles
ALTER TABLE professional_profiles 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL AFTER website,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS moderatedBy VARCHAR(64) AFTER status,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS moderatedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER moderatedBy,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS moderationNote TEXT AFTER moderatedAt,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reportCount INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER moderationNote,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isReported BOOLEAN DEFAULT false AFTER reportCount,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reportedBy JSON AFTER isReported

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS moderatedBy VARCHAR(64) AFTER status,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS moderatedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER moderatedBy,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS moderationNote TEXT AFTER moderatedAt,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reportCount INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER moderationNote,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isReported BOOLEAN DEFAULT false AFTER reportCount,
